text: Ia atrivibar kuabar tuziba ko, mɨdorozir gumazibar faragha zuir gumaziba ko mɨdorozir gumaziba ko, hoziabar kuabar tuziba ko dagh apiazir gumazibar kuabar tuzibar amam. Egh ia gumazamiziba bar men kuabar tuzibar amam, pura ingangarir gumazamizir kɨniba ko gumazamizir fɨriaghɨreziba, ko pura gumazamiziba ko gumazamizir ziaba itiba!”
